Conceptual overview This chapter provides a concise introduction to the concept of using IBM LinuxONE or IBM Z as an enterprise-grade private or hybrid cloud infrastructure for Linux workloads. Although the concepts of virtualization and cloud computing are familiar to many by now, there is information in this section that is likely to be unknown, even to readers who might consider themselves experts. For this reason, it is our recommendation that anyone reading this book should fully read and understand this chapter.
